amendment.description: An amendment numbered 130 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit any funds from being used to finalize, implement, or enforce the Administration's proposed NEPA Phase 2 regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stauber amendment (A080) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stauber amendment (A080) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stauber amendment (A080) Agreed to by voice vote.
